Brooklyn Field Day. Two Thousand School Children In Various Athletic Exercises.

Patterned much along the same lines as the recent Field Day demonstration on the Athletic Green in Central Park, in which 10,000 public school children contested in the newest styles of school athletics. Brooklyn yesterday held a similar event in the annual Field Day of the Vacation Playgrounds Association of Brooklyn at Brooklyn Athletic Field. ...

Source:
New York Times; August 20, 1913, Wednesday
